侹字的基本解释

侹
tǐng
代替。
〔侹侹〕形容平直而长。
平直。

侹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǐng］
［《廣韻》他鼎切，上迥，透。］
［《廣韻》他定切，去徑，透。］
(1)挺直。
(2)引申为平直而长的样子。参见“侹侹”。
(3)代替。

侹字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　侹； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页103第23
【集韻】待鼎切【韻會】他頂切【正韻】徒鼎切，?汀上聲。【說文】長貌。一曰著地，一曰代也。【揚子·方言】?楚之閒謂之侹。　又敬也。　又平也。【韓愈·答張徹詩】石梁平侹侹，沙水光泠泠。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他定切，音聽。義同。

侹字的起名意思

平直，长的样子。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǐng］
["Guang Yun" He is cut, on the top, and through. ]
["Guangyun" He is determined to cut, go to the path, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Straight.
(2) The extension is straight and long. See "yi yi".
(3) Replace.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　侹; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 103 Page 23
[Jiyun] Waiting for Dingqie [Rhyme] He end-cut [Zhengyun] Dingqie, and Ting said. [Speaking text] Long appearance. One is landing, and the other is generation. [Yangtze Dialect]? Chu Xian is called "Yang".　Respect again.　It's flat too. [Han Yu·Answer to Zhang Che's Poem] Shiliang Pingyi, Sha Shuiguang Lingling.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? He fixed the cut and listened to it. The same meaning.
